languages.text: "Насилие и смута. Мятеж искаженных душ! Предатели гласом притворным по воксу вещают о бунте, клевещут, что умертвить попытались Лорд-капитана блюстители и офицеры. Но то были не они... То были выродки из теней".

"Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."
languages.original_text: "Насилие и смута. Мятеж искаженных душ! Предатели гласом притворным по воксу вещают о бунте, клевещут, что умертвить попытались Лорд-капитана блюстители и офицеры. Но то были не они... То были выродки из теней".

traits.locale_text: "Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox, say the enforcers tried to butcher the Lord Captain. But they did not... It was the dusky anathemas that did."

"Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox, say the enforcers tried to butcher the Lord Captain. But they did not... It was the dusky anathemas that did."

"Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They say the enforcers tried to butcher the Lord Captain. But they did not... It was the dusky anathemas who made the attempt on the Lord Captain's life."

"Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."

"Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."

"Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."

languages.text: «Violencia y alboroto. ¡Un motín de almas retorcidas! Los traidores hablan con voz falsa por el voco. Hablan de personal de seguridad y oficiales que buscaban matar a su Lord Capitán. Pero no lo buscaban. Eran las abominaciones envueltas en mugre quienes amenazaban a{mf|l| la} Domin».
languages.original_text: "Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."

traits.locale_text: «Violencia y alboroto. ¡Un motín de almas retorcidas! Los traidores hablan con voz falsa por el voco. Hablan de personal de seguridad y oficiales que buscaban matar a su Lord Capitán. Pero no lo buscaban. Eran las abominaciones envueltas en mugre quienes amenazaban a{mf|l| la} Domin».

languages.text: 「暴力と混乱。歪んだ魂の反乱！裏切り者たちは、偽りの声でヴォクスに語りかけた。奴らは、ロード・キャプテン殺しを目論むエンフォーサーと士官がいると話したのだ。しかし、そんな事実はないことが分かったよ…ドミンを脅かしたのは、濁りまみれの忌まわしきものだったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."

traits.locale_text: 「暴力と混乱。歪んだ魂の反乱！裏切り者たちは、偽りの声でヴォクスに語りかけた。奴らは、ロード・キャプテン殺しを目論むエンフォーサーと士官がいると話したのだ。しかし、そんな事実はないことが分かったよ…ドミンを脅かしたのは、濁りまみれの忌まわしきものだったのだ」

languages.text: “暴力与动乱，扭曲的灵魂发动的兵变！那些叛徒以虚假的声音盖过了音阵系统，他们说有执法者和军官打算杀害领主舰长。那些忠诚的船员没有发现……威胁秘者安全的敌人，是潜伏在黑暗之中的怪物。”
languages.original_text: "Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."

traits.locale_text: “暴力与动乱，扭曲的灵魂发动的兵变！那些叛徒以虚假的声音盖过了音阵系统，他们说有执法者和军官打算杀害领主舰长。那些忠诚的船员没有发现……威胁秘者安全的敌人，是潜伏在黑暗之中的怪物。”

languages.text: "Gewalt und Aufruhr. Eine Meuterei der verdorbenen Seelen! Die Verräter sprechen mit falscher Stimme über das Vox. Sie sprechen von Enforcern und Offizieren, die ihren Lord Captain töten wollten. Doch gesucht haben sie nicht ... Es waren die ins Trübe gehüllten Abscheulichkeiten, die {mf|den|die} Domin bedrohten."
languages.original_text: "Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."

traits.locale_text: "Gewalt und Aufruhr. Eine Meuterei der verdorbenen Seelen! Die Verräter sprechen mit falscher Stimme über das Vox. Sie sprechen von Enforcern und Offizieren, die ihren Lord Captain töten wollten. Doch gesucht haben sie nicht ... Es waren die ins Trübe gehüllten abscheulichkeiten, die {mf|den|die} Domin bedrohten."

languages.text: « Violence et émoi. Une mutinerie d'âmes égarées ! La voix des traîtres est trompeuse à travers le vox. Ils parlent de prévôts et d'officiers qui auraient cherché à tuer leur {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais c'est faux... Ce sont les abominations enveloppées de ténèbres qui ont menacé {mf|le|la} Domin. »
languages.original_text: "Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."

traits.locale_text: « Violence et émoi. Une mutinerie d'âmes égarées ! La voix des traîtres est trompeuse à travers le vox. Ils parlent de prévôts et d'officiers qui auraient cherché à tuer leur {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais c'est faux... Ce sont les abominations enveloppées de ténèbres qui ont menacé {mf|le|la} Domin. »

languages.text: "Şiddet ve kargaşa yaşanıyor. Sapkın ruhların isyanı vuku buluyor! Hainler, voks üzerinden başkalarının sesleriyle konuşuyor! Lord Kaptan'ı katletmeye çalışan infazcılar ve subaylardan bahsediyorlar. Ancak kan peşinde koşanlar onlar değildi... Domin'i tehdit edenler, ruhlarını kasvet kaplamış ucubelerdi."
languages.original_text: "Violence and turmoil. A mutiny of twisted souls! The traitors speak in a false voice over the vox. They speak of enforcers and officers who sought to slay their Lord Captain. But seek they did not... It was the murk-wreathed abominations who threatened the Domin."
